description: This is a Dart source file defining the NotesProvider class, which manages the state of notes, including loading, adding, updating, and deleting notes, and interacts with a notes repository.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider managing notes list and related operations.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the repository and loads the initial set of notes.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes from the repository, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided title and content, then refreshes the list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates the given note with optional new title and content, then reloads notes.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes the specified note by its ID and refreshes the list.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Returns a note with the given ID if present in the current list.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Sets a new search query and notifies listeners.
